name: The Bandage
overview: The Bandage is a 1991 text adventure developed by Megastyle for the Commodore 64. It is heavily based on, and set in the world of The King's Quest series from Sierra. King Graham has died, and Rosella has to go into the forest seeking for a prince. But since she's a queen now, since her father died, the prince she will find will now be a king!. But anyway, in order to complete the game, she HAS to find him (and solve all the puzzles, and obstacles in her path (which will be very easy in this game)).
